pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Secure TarSecure Tarfile libraryIt's a streaming wrapper around python tarfile and allow secure handling files and support encryption.```pythonwith SecureTarFile("test.tar", "w") as tar_file: atomic_contents_add( tar_file, temp_orig, excludes=[], arcname=".", )with SecureTarFile("test.tar", "w", b"AES128_KEY_SIZE") as tar_file: atomic_contents_add( tar_file, temp_orig, excludes=[], arcname=".", )```
